mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_qxsj ( qxsj_code, qxsj_name, qxsj_type, qxsj_menu, qxsj_sort, qxsj_used, qxsj_text, ADD_USER_ID, ADD_TIME, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_TIME, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{qxsj_code}, #{qxsj_name}, #{qxsj_type}, #{qxsj_menu}, #{qxsj_sort}, #{qxsj_used}, #{qxsj_text}, #{sys_user}, NOW(), #{sys_user}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT T1.qxsj_code AS qxsj_code, T1.qxsj_name AS qxsj_name, T1.qxsj_type AS qxsj_type, T1.qxsj_menu AS qxsj_menu, T1.qxsj_sort AS qxsj_sort, T1.qxsj_used AS qxsj_used, T1.qxsj_text AS qxsj_text, T1.ADD_USER_ID AS addUserId, T1.ADD_TIME AS addTime, T1.UPD_USER_ID AS updUserId, T1.UPD_TIME AS updTime FROM sys_qxsj T1 WHERE T1.qxsj_code = #{qxsj_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_qxsj SET qxsj_name = #{qxsj_name}, qxsj_type = #{qxsj_type}, qxsj_menu = #{qxsj_menu}, qxsj_sort = #{qxsj_sort}, qxsj_used = #{qxsj_used}, qxsj_text = #{qxsj_text}, UPD_USER_ID = #{sys_user}, UPD_TIME = NOW(), VERSION = VERSION + 1 WHERE qxsj_code=#{qxsj_code}
